definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: Lying in the emergency room looking pale.
sentences.chinese: 躺在急诊室的她脸色看起很苍白。

sentences.english: It works by turning the sounds of the dental consulting room into a digital signal.
sentences.chinese: 它的工作原理是将口腔诊室内的声音转化为数字信号。

sentences.english: The old chart should accompany the patient from the ER to the patient ward where he's admitted.
sentences.chinese: 旧病历应伴着病人从急诊室送人病房。

sentences.english: We decide to take him to the ER.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把他带往急诊室。

sentences.english: A man sitting in the waiting-room wanted to see the doctor.
sentences.chinese: 在候诊室中坐着的男人想找医生看病。

sentences.english: We call it the dentist's waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以堪称牙医的候诊室。

sentences.english: Please wait in the waiting room.
Then he was struck with a severe sinus infection, which led to two ER visits.
sentences.chinese: 后来，他患上严重的窦感染，曾两次住进急诊室。

sentences.english: After I graduated medical school, I worked as an intern in an emergency room.
sentences.chinese: 从医学院毕业后，我在急诊室做见习医生。

sentences.english: Jake sat in the waiting room, unsure about going in or not.
sentences.chinese: 杰克坐在候诊室，不知道是否该进去。

sentences.english: Medical emergency-room dramas will never be the same again.
sentences.chinese: 如此这般，急诊室的剧幕必将不复从前。

sentences.english: A few days later, a lawyer from Los Angele sent to the emergency room.
sentences.chinese: 几天后，一位洛杉矶来的律师出现在急诊室。

sentences.english: Get in early and you’ll spend less time in the waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 早晨来看医生就不会在候诊室多花时间。

sentences.english: Hermother brought her to the Emergency Room the following morning.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲在第二天早晨将她带到了急诊室。

sentences.english: The little patient accompanied by his parents was sitting at the waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 那位小病人由他父母陪同，坐在候诊室里。

sentences.english: TheE.R. nurses had found an ID tag attached to his key ring.
sentences.chinese: 急诊室护士在他的钥匙环上找到一张小身份卡。

definition: waiting to see a doctor/awaiting treatment
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
department of gynecology and obstetrics/birth clinic
